title: The Americans S:3 | E:13 March 8, 1983 | Slate TV Club
description:
Each week on Slate's TV Club Insider podcast, the creators, cast, and crew of The Americans reveal behind-the-scenes details about the making of the FX drama's third season. 
In this installment about the Season 3 finale, “March 8, 1983,” stars Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, and Holly Taylor join script coordinator Molly Nussbaum and executive producers Joel Fields and Joe Weisberg to share their thoughts on the cliffhanger ending, their favorite moments from Season 3, and what might lie in store for the Jennings in Season 4. 
 
Note: This podcast contains spoilers and is meant to be enjoyed after you watch the episode.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
